name: disable-failing-services
description: Disables services installed by yocto that are known to fail.

commands.cmd: systemctl disable camera_cgroup.service chg-policy.service dhcpd.service dhcpd6.service dnsmasq.service fs-scrub-daemon.service ipacm.service lunch-make-scripts.service qti_pppd.service ql-power-manager.service
